pkgmetadata.longdescription: A simple multi-channel audio mixer that supports 8 channels of 16 bit stereo audio, plus a single channel of music. It can load FLAC, MP3, Ogg, VOC, and WAV format audio. It can also load MIDI, MOD, and Opus audio, depending on build options. It is a part of the SDL project, and is used by many games and applications.

use.flag: Use vendored dr_{flac,mp3} instead of media-libs/flac and/or media-sound/mpg123-base for those formats
Support additional music formats with media-libs/game-music-emu
Install playwave and playmus tools (useful for testing)
Use dev-libs/stb instead of media-libs/libvorbis for OGG Vorbis support
Use media-libs/tremor instead of media-libs/libvorbis for OGG Vorbis support
